Uses of Package
co.cask.cdap.api.flow.flowlet

Packages that use co.cask.cdap.api.flow.flowlet
co.cask.cdap.api.flow Flow implementations. 
co.cask.cdap.api.flow.flowlet Interfaces used in flows and flowlets. 
co.cask.cdap.api.stream Interfaces for stream interactions. 
co.cask.cdap.internal.flowlet This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API. 
 

Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.flow.flowlet used by co.cask.cdap.api.flow

FlowletSpecification

Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.flow.flowlet used by co.cask.cdap.api.flow.flowlet
Callback
          Interface for flowlet to implement in order to receive callback on process result.
FailurePolicy
          Enumerates class that defines policy for handling failure.
FailureReason
          This class carries information about the reason of failure.
FailureReason.Type
          Specifies the type of errors that can be seen during processing of input and while applying the operations generated during the processing.
Flowlet
          Defines the Flowlet interface.
FlowletContext
          This interface represents the Flowlet context.
FlowletSpecification
          This class provides specification of a Flowlet.
FlowletSpecification.Builder.AfterDescription
          Class defining the action after defining the description for a flowlet.

          Class defining the description setter that is used as part of the builder.
FlowletSpecification.Builder.NameSetter
           
InputContext
          Represents the context of the input data that is passed to Flowlet for processing.
StreamEvent
          Represents single event from a stream.
